Title: Virtual Channels Associate
RoleDescription:
At Peacock, we know life is complicated but believe entertainment shouldnt be. We envision a more human streaming experience that embraces the entertainment you love. Backed by 100+ years of NBCUniversal legacy, we know how to entertain. We combine this legacy with an insatiable itch for innovation, embracing the data and technologies that challenge the status quo. Our team is never done obsessing over how best to deliver excellence across television, film, sports, news, and more.
This ambition is a group effort. As challengers at heart, our secret weapon is our talented team of big thinkers, data-driven drivers of growth and innovation. We start by putting people first, embracing empathy and compassion to create a more dynamic, more fulfilling workplace and a better, more enjoyable product. As a company, we embrace the power of transparency and inclusion. We know the best idea can come from anywhere, so were committed to creating an organization where we act as one and put ego aside. The NBCUniversal Internship Program allows students to unlock their potential by contributing to big projects in meaningful ways that matter. To thrive as an NBCU intern, you are ready to bring your passion for media, entertainment, and technology along with your desire to learn each day. Upload a transcript (unofficial transcripts are fine) that confirms your status as an actively enrolled student in a degree-granting program. 
 Advertising Sales division is large and complex, but these are the general business areas. Ad sales at NBCU Advertising & Partnerships is a multifaceted operation that supports clients through various specialized teams. The Client Team builds and maintains relationships with advertisers, while Ad Strategy and Programmatic ensure targeted and data-driven ad placements. Global Planning and Agency Planning focus on media planning across regions and agencies. Digital Sales Operations handles the technical aspects of digital ad delivery, with Account Services providing client support. Creative Partnerships craft innovative ad content, and Sports Sales capitalizes on NBCU's extensive sports portfolio. Finally, Marketing and Brand Partnerships drive collaborative campaigns, while Data, Measurements, Insights analyze performance to optimize strategies.  Areas of placement may include, but are not limited to: Media planning & Business Operations: Social Media Partnership: The Social Partnerships Team builds and operates a portfolio of ad sales partnerships with leading and emerging digital platforms, including Meta, TikTok, YouTube, and more. That includes identifying profitable revenue opportunities, developing the structure, capabilities, go-to-market strategies, and execution plans necessary to capture growth opportunities and driving those plans to implementation and through ongoing operations. We are within the Ad Sales organization and a part of the greater Partnerships team. We partner closely with the sales teams and content teams to manage and drive rapid revenue growth. Skycastle, Social: produces native content and manages paid social campaigns for all local stations. Interns support us researching, writing and translating content, and monitoring social campaigns.  Communications: From an external communications standpoint, you will support communications responsibilities, including executive communications, media relations and administrative support Commerce Partnerships: Commerce Partnerships is an emerging business within Josh Feldmans Marketing & Brand Partnerships organization. Our teams work centers around creating shoppable entertainment across any platform where NBCU content lives. We are working to fulfill the long sought-after dream to - either with a click of a button or tap of a remote -instantly purchase the amazing products and services you see in tv shows, digital content, social platforms, virtual worlds, and more. Marketing & Brand Partnerships: The Marketing Brand and Partnership teams are responsible for developing creative and custom concepts for different clients. Some teams have the opportunity to work with events, generating marketing solutions for clients like Peacock, News Development, and high profile markets such as Apple, AT&T, BMW, Delta, Diageo, LOreal, Nissan/Infiniti, Pepsi, State Farm, Uber, VW, Wells Fargo and more.   Planning: The planning roles consist of the pre-sale support team (Strategic Planning, Platform Monetization) as well as the post-sale support team (Account Services).  The Strategic Planning team is one of the largest entities in Ad Sales and supports the Account Executives and Account Directors with pre-sale campaign planning, including pricing, inventory, ad placement, etc.  Digital Sports Pricing & Planning: The Digital Sports Pricing & Planning Intern provides support to the Sport Digital Pricing & Planning team. This role will aid the Pricing & Planning team in ensuring campaigns are properly managed, internal systems are reflecting accurate information and assisting our team in driving revenue to the organization. These projects will surround our  properties such as the NFL, NBA, Big Ten, Premier League and more!    Streaming & Data Products: This intern will be responsible for assisting all aspects of digital sales planning and inventory management and providing timely and accurate information to the planning, sales and inventory team. This includes assisting with building of media plans, order entry, Op1 modifications/optimizations, weekly deal stewardship, quality assurance checks, invoice reconciliation, ad-hoc reporting and assisting with inventory, process and guideline documentation.
